articles.title: Watch: Sun Unleashes Powerful Solar Flare, Disrupts Radio Signals In Australia, Japan - NDTV
articles.description: The flare, originating from sunspot AR3738, occurred late Saturday night (July 13) at 10:34 p.m. EDT (0234 UT on July 14), and was captured in stunning detail by NASA's Solar Dynamics Observatory.
